snippet: The 3 points the Americans earned with their opening victory could be all the points they need, thanks in part to Germany’s 4-0 rout of Portugal.
abstract: United States' win over Ghana could be enough to allow team to advance out of group stage at the World Cup, in which goal differentials are used to resolve ties; key factor will be Portugal's crushing 4-0 loss to Germany.
lead_paragraph: The 3 points the Americans earned with their opening victory could be all the points they need, thanks in part to Germany’s 4-0 rout of Portugal.

headline.main: For U.S., Win Over Ghana May Be Enough to Advance
headline.print_headline: For U.S., Win Over Ghana May Be Enough to Advance

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
